item.title: C# Unit Testing

item.title: Plant UML Introduction

item.title: Agile Principles Patterns Practices in C# (14)

item.title: Agile Principles Patterns Practices in C# (11)
item.description: Dependency Inversion Principle 高層模組不應該依賴於(相依於)低層模組。二者都應該依賴於抽象 抽象不應該依賴於細節，細節應該依賴於抽象。 一個設計良好的物件導向程式，相對

item.title: Agile Principles Patterns Practices in C# (10)

item.title: Agile Principles Patterns Practices in C# (9)

item.title: Agile Principles Patterns Practices in C# (8)

item.title: Agile Principles Patterns Practices in C# (7)

item.title: Agile Principles Patterns Practices in C# (4)
